comments.author: Cleaning London
comments.content:
These small mushrooms looks so good! I bet they are delicious! I love eating small mushrooms over the pan with butter and some dill and a pinch of salt. But your recipe grabs me !

I want to ask you did they become sour, or the vinegar evaporates while cooking? And leaves the aroma? I have balsamic vinegar from my last trip in Italy!

comments.author: maria faria
comments.content:
humm... looks good!! fantastic recipe!
Good job!!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content:
Hey Nicolas - yes, they are meant to be slightly tart, with a mild vinegar bite - almost like lightly pickled.






Michael Natkin

The latest from my blog, Herbivoracious:  Hongos en Escabeche - Mushrooms Sauteed with Sherry Vinegar - Recipe

comments.author: The Italian Dish
comments.content: This post really caught my eye.  I love mushrooms this way!  I make this with some balsamic and serve along with grilled steaks.  Love your photo.

comments.author: Dee at Deelicious Sweets
comments.content: This looks amazing! I'm hosting a Vegan Wednesday Blog Hop today. I would love for you to link up!

comments.author: Russell at Chasing Delicious
comments.content: What a scrumptious side. My love for mushroom is slowly growing so I think I might be to the point where I can try a dish with mushrooms as the focus. It looks great!

comments.author: Aggie
comments.content: I love mushrooms and would devour these. Looks delicious!

comments.author: Rachel @ CloudsAndClovers.com
comments.content: Wow this looks incredible! Great photo too! The green just pops! And I LOVE mushrooms!! I will definitely be trying this one out!

comments.author: will sue
comments.content:
Good work, i love the concept.
Best regards!
Sue

comments.author: Nancy (guinnah)
comments.content: funny...I didn't come looking for a mushroom recipe I was just blog hopping.  But I happen to have a pound of crimini mushrooms (for a mushroom curry) but find I'm missing the coconut milk I thought I had.  I might just have a slight change of plans here.  Looks wonderful.

comments.author: Mushrooms Canada
comments.content:
Sounds delicious! I prefer mine sauteed in balsamic with rosemary and thyme... but in all honesty, I will eat mushrooms any which way! lol
Thanks for sharing!
- Brittany

comments.author: Allison
comments.content: they were delicious! absolutely delicious.  totally recommend it and goes well as  side to the double crusted broccoli raab pizza. (or inside it)

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Ooh, I like the idea of these inside a pizza... that's crazy talk!
